block.p: HOLZMAN-Matilda. The Board of Directors and staff of The Hebrew Home for the Aged at Riverdale mourn, with sorrow, the death of Matilda Holzman, sister of our dear friend and colleague, Rose Dobrof. We extend our sincere sympathy to Rose, the entire Holzman and Dobrof families upon their sad loss. Milton A. Gilbert, Pres. Bernard Goldberg, Chairman Daniel A. Reingold, Exec. V.P.

HOLZMAN-Matilda. The Board of Directors and staff of The Hebrew Home for the Aged at Riverdale mourn, with sorrow, the death of Matilda Holzman, sister of our dear friend and colleague, Rose Dobrof. We extend our sincere sympathy to Rose, the entire Holzman and Dobrof families upon their sad loss. Milton A. Gilbert, Pres. Bernard Goldberg, Chairman Daniel A. Reingold, Exec. V.P.
